title: UNABLE TO PLAY LOL
body:
Logging in is fine. Selecting Champions is fine, but after that its been telling me to reconnect and its telling to reconnect again and again until theres a black screen. 
Anyone help please D:

replies.body: I'd say try and re-download the client

Same thing is happening to me even though I have tried resetting the router, trying a different computer and bypassing the router completely. Keeps coming up with 'Unable to connect to server' And when I retry it does the same again about 30 seconds later. Hopefully its just a bug that they sort out soon!
Alt+F4 and Re-log when it disconnects you the first time. Don't just mash the reconnect button
